Title: The Earth Queen
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Tim Hedrick, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: Korra and Asami collect tax money for Queen Hou Ting. Mako and Bolin suffer an unexpected family reunion. Kai can't get rid of his old habit. Lord Zuko visits a secret prison in Northen Water Tribe.
